a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Life expectancy vs. GDP per capita, 2015
The vertical axis shows life expectancy at birth.
The horizontal axis shows real GDP per capita, adjusted for inflation and price differences across countries and
Source: Riley (2005), Clio Infra (2015), UN Population Division (2019), Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden (2020))
